title: bbc.reporter
author: bbc.reporter
content: Begin learning and researching on which projects will survive this bear market. It is very clear that a bullish argument for good projects with good development teams have been made stronger today. After more dumps on the market are made, the investors will move more to seek value projects for holding than seek projects for short term and midterm trading and speculation.Much of the projects in the market will never pump and never reach all time high again. However, there might be 5% of altcoin projects that are presently being prepared to create their all time highs when the market recovers. This is a market for investing in good development teams. The time of marketers and shills are over.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: bbc.reporter on May 21, 2022, 03:21:25 AMMuch of the projects in the market will never pump and never reach all time high again. However, there might be 5% of altcoin projects that are presently being prepared to create their all time highs when the market recovers. This is a market for investing in good development teams. The time of marketers and shills are over.The sp500 was pulled from the bear market yesterday in the last 2 hours of trading. Othervise it would close weekly candles 20% below ATH which would confirm that we entered bear market. Its very risky moment for investing. especially in crypto. All projects, no matter if good or bad, can dump another 80-90%. Is it good time for long term investments? I guess not because even good projects can not recover in 2025-2027 bubble because in next 5 years new, better technology can be developed. And I think that If we are about to see 1-3 years of bear market its not like 5% of altcoins get to new ATH. There are 18 000 coins and i think that only ~3-5 are quite good. 5-20 are interresting. Rest of them are shitcoins. So we are talking about 0.1% not 5%.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: All altcoins investors have to know that now is the time to think long term, think big and be ready for what the market brings. Things will change over the next year or two. Investors who are ready for a bear market can experience significant gains by waiting it out for a while. In addition, the rewards from investing in some of the good projects that will survive this bear market is immense.This situation will make some projects fail, most probably. But it will also produce some of the best blockchain applications with a lot of value, that will survive the bear market and perhaps end up as the next multi billion dollar market.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Yeah, it's going to be survival of the fittest now for the majority of the altcoins in the market. Some of them might live, but majority I think will die in this bear market. Not only that, there could be exchanges that are going to closed in this bearish trend just like in 2018. So it's going to be very tough for everyone, but for those who have seen this in 2018-2020 sure knows what's coming and how to adjust in this cycle.

comments.author: wildan88
comments.body: I think that was a brave way to invest your money in this type of project during the dump I don't usually buy some altcoins that doesn't have that good project I usually buy alt coins that is good since even if there is a dump there is no way that it wouldn't recover as their project is a good one not like the one that was shilled all over the internet just to pump and after a dump it usually don't go back to its original price or trend.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Bitcoin is the right choice for the current bear market conditions because bitcoin will provide great returns in the bull market later. For an altcoin project, I guess it won't be easy to find it because there are so many altcoin projects each of which could rise after a bear market. But maybe the top 25 altcoins can be an option to invest in because the price can go up again following the development of bitcoin prices which will rise later. But researching altcoin projects is a must to find what we want and so that we don't go wrong in choosing the coin.But what is clear, in the current bear market conditions, doing research or just looking at the price movements of each coin can also be an option, especially if we are confused about which coin to choose. But bitcoin is a good choice for now.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: You're right, it's the time that the market has been divided already and remains with the best of the best. Investors, newbies and oldies, get to understand that it's not the same as before. Like those hopefuls that have became millionaires due to the pump of those projects like shiba inu and other meme coins. We can say that they're done and it's now time to move on for the better days.

comments.author: Godday
comments.body: I'm sure investors or newbies in the crypto world will start to understand what is better in choosing a coins or tokens.  I mean we should not just follow the trend by buying coins that have no fundamentals and a roadmap that has a reasonable long term plan.  We should see crypto as an asset that has a clear long-term plan, not just a meme coin or a coin that just follows trends.  Let's enjoy the winter that is hitting the market today.

Looking at 2018, we can see that only bitcoin and eth are still holding their ground, most altcoins have been overtaken or replaced by better new ones.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: That's not too difficult to research which projects are still running in this bear market, there are actually many old projects but new projects are full of risks. Indeed, I agree that when the market is bullish, some altcoins can find other new ATH, especially well known Altcoin that can last a long time too. Long term hold are better but you are right, as an investor better find projects carefully, many altcoin will not pump when market recovers.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: The safest way to invest during a bear market is to invest in hype projects, currently Move-to-Earn is becoming hype in the crypto market. It started when the STEPN (GMT) suddenly skyrocketed in price. There will be a lot of people who will add to the market cap in the current M2E hype. But instead of having to find and research new projects, I personally prefer to invest in top CMC projects, Ethereum for example.

comments.author: tyz
comments.body: Quote from: bbc.reporter on May 21, 2022, 03:21:25 AMBegin learning and researching on which projects will survive this bear market.For long-term development, that is certainly true. When the next bull run begins, almost everything will rise again anyway. Therefore, the art is rather to recognize when the bear market is over and the bull market begins. Then it almost doesn't matter what you invest in. At least that was what has happend in the last bull runs.

comments.body: I've experience past bear market and I learned to take profit for projects especially on projects that a long way to go or project that just started during the bull market. I also stored most of my tokens for long term holding on my hardware wallet for better security.
